- cleanup theme to make it look prettier
  - select a better color scheme
- create sample episode
- create a home page
- incorporate logo
- create a slogan and description of the podcast
- create contact us page which sends an email to info@thepacificcurrent.com
- figure out tagging

Instructions for creating an episode
1) Copy the mp3 file into the episodes directory
2) Create the episode using "octopod episode --title <title> --subtitle <subtitle>"
3) Edit the episode markdown file with:
  a) proper duration
  b) proper date
  c) show notes and links
  
4) Run "octopod s" to ensure it is properly deployed
  a) Double check the RSS/JSON feeds
